Home Projects Resume

Projects

Simulation of DC-DC Power Converter using Physics-Informed Neural Networks

Machine Learning PyTorch NumPy ODEs MLP Physics-Informed ML SPICE FPGA MATLAB

The real-time simulation of power converters is necessary for the health monitoring and preventative maintenance to avoid critical failures. Developed a digital twin of a buck converter for simulation and health monitoring to be deployed on FPGA with a 1ns time-step.

Distributed Wireless Sensor Network for Risk Assessment of Levee Breach

Arduino RaspberryPi Electrical Design PCB Design KiCad nRF24 Module Python C

Developed wireless sensor packages with conductivity probes for distributed real-time soil saturation assessment in levees.

ML Brain Tumor Segmentation

Machine Learning Image Segmentation PyTorch NumPy Mamba CNN Transformers U-Net

Developed an ML model for image segmentation of brain tumors in MRI images using a Mamba model, a competitor to Transformers boasting a faster throughput. Additional approaches using transformers and CNNs were also implemented.
